thread.title: Carrie Underwood Workout With Her Son
thread.title_full: Carrie Underwood Workout With Her Son | POPSUGAR Fitness

author: Perri Konecky
title: Carrie Underwood Workout With Her Son
text:
My workout buddy...mama's in @caliabycarrie and the big man is in his fire truck PJs...whatever works! #StayThePath PS, please excuse my yoga form...I don't do much yoga, but like to stretch...
A post shared by Carrie Underwood (@carrieunderwood) on Mar 22, 2017 at 4:06pm PDT
We are full supporters of working out with a partner ; not only do they push you to work harder, but you can teach each other moves and enhance your fitness regimen in so many fun ways, and our new favorite fitness duo can attest to that. Carrie Underwood recently took to Instagram to share a video working out with her son Isaiah , and let's just say they've both got some impressive moves.
Carrie and her son do some push-ups, Up Dogs, Down dogs, child's pose, and some squats, until Isaiah got tired and Carrie picked him up and added some weight â€” because babies are better than barbells right?!
Related:
Get In Carrie Underwood-Shape With Her 5 Favorite Workouts
The 34-year-old country star is constantly inspiring our workouts with her killer legs and impressive post-baby body , but it's Isiah's moves that have us convinced Carrie has found her new workout buddy for life.
Image Source: Instagram user carrieunderwood
